top.title: Iran medics describe overwhelmed hospitals as protests continue

top.title: Trump says US needs to 'own' Greenland to prevent Russia and China from taking it
top.summary: The US will do it "the easy way" or "the hard way", he says, but Denmark stresses the territory is not for sale.

top.title: Video emerges of Minneapolis shooting filmed by ICE agent who opened fire
top.summary: The clip shows the moments before gunfire rang out on a Minneapolis street.

top.title: X could face UK ban over deepfakes, minister says
top.summary: It comes after government urged Ofcom to use all its powers – up to and including an effective ban – against X.

top.summary: The firm says its chatbot sees health and wellbeing questions from 230 million people every week.
